name: 0 - Intro
_source: speak;; Lumshaw Ocean: the sea that encompasses the border between Sunder and Rosefall.{w} Sunderian ships that try to sail through are often sunk to splinters by patrolling Umbrans...;;;hint
speak;Mia; Well, well, well{tgm}...{tgm}{w} The job may be easy, but this crew sure ain't normal{tgm}...

speak;Mia; And they seem like a bunch o' suckers{tgm}...{tgm}{w} If I can filch their gold and hit the hills when we land, it'd be an easy score.{w} How far north do I want my moral compass to point today?{w} Ah, decisions, decisions{tgm}...
speak;Mia; I wonder if{tgm}...{tgm} WHOA!!! Hey, watch it, Goldilocks!
speak;Nelson; Ah, sorry! I'd love to talk, lady, but I'm in a bit of a hurry!
speak;Mia; A hurry, you say?{w} If you're going to bump into me like that,{w} the only thing you're in a hurry for is an axe to the face!
speak;Nelson; Such a brutish woman!{w} How does a beautiful, radiant face like yours have such a nasty attitude?
speak;Mia; Grrr{tgm}...{tgm} What was that, pretty boy?{w} You wanna say it to the edge of my axe?
speak;Nelson; Er- Don't do anything rash with that axe, now{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I meant to say that your hair is wonderful!{w} And your face is like that of a goddess!{w} And your axe is-
speak;SoldierBlue; There he is!{w} The little slimeball who stole our gold supply!
speak;Nelson; See you on the flipside!
speak;SoldierRed; Don't let him escape this time!
speak;Mia; Damn dastard.{w} Hope he gets what's coming to him.
music;Is a Transparent Enemy our Ally
speak;Evelyn; Captain Pam of the Havergue Sea Guard, how do you fare?
speak;Pam; I fare well, General Evelyn of long, formal names.{w} <red>Captain Pam</> works just fine.

speak;Evelyn; Hm, very well.{w} I bring orders from His Majesty.{w} You are to stop any incoming ships and detain the sailors.{w} Take them back to the capital as soon as you can,{w} and if they refuse to comply, do with them as you see fit.
speak;Pam; Oh, yes, that will do nicely{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Do you hear it, Evelyn?
speak;Evelyn; Er{tgm}...{tgm} What are you referring to?
speak;Pam; The sound of my magic.{w} It's thirsting for more blood for my experiments.{w} Hehehe, it's excited to feed again{tgm}...
speak;Evelyn; Perhaps I should move to another ship...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk

speak;Evelyn; One more thing{tgm}...{tgm}{w} A traitor to the empire has fled Castle Umbra.{w} We had a bit of a scufle, but he managed to weasel away,{w} and we've tracked him to somewhere on this very ship.{w} I don't care if you have to analyze every splinter.{w} Find the turncoat.
speak;Pam; You don't have to tell me twice, General Eveie!{w} If he resists, do we have permission to execute him?
speak;Evelyn; I'd prefer to take him alive, but{tgm}...{tgm}yes.{w} Permission granted.
speak;Pam; Understood! We will get it done.{w} But before that{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Did you happen to stab him at all?{w} Anything that might've drawn blood will do.
speak;Evelyn; I think this was the arrow that grazed his leg, but I've cleaned it since-
speak;Evelyn; Gah! Fine, fine, keep it!
speak;Pam; Ehehehe, don't worry, General Evelyn.{w} The Umbra Empire wil make the debt of betrayal paid in full with blood!
speak;Pam; Maybe he can be my next test subject...or even something better!;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Evelyn; His Majesty relies upon you, Captain.{w} Be sure his trust is not misplaced.{w} That is all.
speak;Evelyn; That smile of hers puts me on edge...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Evelyn; How does His Majesty hold such faith in people like this?{w} If only I could hold the same conviction in the righteousness of our emperor...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Evelyn; No{tgm}...{tgm} Pay no mind to me. Come, Mirian, let's go.{w} From here we ride northeast, back to the fort to finish planning our attack.
speak;Emma; So these are the seas of Lumshaw{tgm}...
speak;Emma; The waves gleaming with light and the animals in the water are so beautiful!{w} Ahhh, and that nice salty sea smell is so nice.
speak;Emily; I think I'm going to barf again{tgm}...
speak;Emily; Someone pass me the bucket{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; Maybe we should find you a doctor when we hit shore{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I don't think this amount of vomiting is normal or healthy.
speak;Caroline; I don't understand. What does she have left in her stomach to hurl...?;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Emma; Mother, I have some worries about the people sailing us to Rosefall{tgm}...{tgm}{w} They seem a bit shifty.
speak;Caroline; It was a rush job.{w} We could only get so many people so fast,{w} and it was hard getting this thing to leave port.{w} At least there are plenty of supplies from the previous owner.
speak;Emma; I wonder where this vessel was meant to set sail to{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; I wouldn't worry about it. Dead men don't speak.{w} If they could, I doubt they'd tell you anything life-changing.
speak;Emma; How about you rest yourself? I can handle patrol on my own.
speak;Caroline; Eh, I'm not old enough to need midday naps yet.{w} Your sister and I can take care of lookout just fine.
speak;Emma; Well, I was just offering since I think Emily's a bit too green to look straight.
speak;Caroline; We'll be fine, Emma.{w} Come, let us both patrol together for any danger.
speak;Emily; Hey, it's not my fault that I'm seasick!{w} I can't control it!
speak;Emma; On the bright side, I think it's slimming you up a bit.
speak;Emily; Oh, now you've done it! Why, I oughta{tgm}...
speak;Emma; Mother, look!{w} A ship is passing us by!{w} With such a detailed dragon crest on its sail{tgm}...

speak;Caroline; That's an Umbra ship{tgm}...{tgm}and they don't look like diplomats.{w} Everyone, brace yourselves!{w} We've got demon forces coming up on our three and nine!{w} Prepare to be boarded!
speak;SoldierBlue; Catch him! Don't let him escape!
speak;SoldierRed; That way! He went that way!
speak;Nelson; Sorry boys, but it looks like the only thing you could run circles around are rocks!
speak;SoldierBlue; Traitor Nelson!{w} Come quietly, and you may have the chance to grovel before His Majesty.{w} If you don't, we <red>will</> kill you in cold blood!
speak;Nelson; Who even says that? "I'm gonna kill you in cold blood." What are you guys, thirteen?{w} Also, it's not "in cold blood" if you're killing me for resisting arrest.
speak;Caroline; Careful, one of them's advancing on us!
speak;Caroline; I know what an innocent looks like, and you're definitely not one.
speak;Nelson; Fine, I'm less guilty!{w} All I did was steal from the bad guys.
speak;Emma; Who are you?{w} You're going to make Umbra storm our ship!
speak;Nelson; Oh, I am <bconvo>thankful</> you asked, you <bconvo>lovely</> example of a woma-
speak;Caroline; Hold the tongue about my daughter or I'll cut it off.

speak;Nelson; Nelson's the name, and piracy's my game.{w} Those suckers on that Umbran ship hired me for my axe,{w} but I've been slowly siphoning their gold supply!{w} Would've worked too if they hadn't caught me in the act.{w} It's mighty remarkable timing that you came across me in my time of need.{w} Perhaps we were destined to meet, mystery woman.
speak;Caroline; Her name is Emma, and mine is Caroline.{w} And tell me, <bconvo>Nelson</>, why should we allow you aboard our ship?
speak;Nelson; Sharing some of this gold should settle the deal then, right?{w} There's plenty to go around.
speak;Caroline; Hm{tgm}...{tgm}fine. We need the money.{w} But you're going to keep your mouth, hands, and eyes off my daughters,{w} or I <bconvo>will</> throw you overboard.
speak;Nelson;Er,{c:bop_portrait;Nelson} noted!{w} I look forward to our very fruitful partnerships together!
speak;Nelson; And I especially can't wait to snag their gold and food before hightailing it in a lifeboat!;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;SoldierRed; You there, pirate!{w} Make yourself useful and go grab that turncoat who jumped ships.{w} Special orders from Captain Pam!

speak;Mia; I had a rough day, so I ain't in the mood to get bossed around by some buckethead.{w} I didn't sign up to spend months at sea with the most insufferable crew imaginable!{w} I'd better get a raise for this, or my axe'll be going places other than the enemy's face!
speak;SoldierRed; I'm reporting you to the captain!{w} You'll be lucky if she just docks your pay!{w} Don't forget, you can be replaced in the blink of an eye, filthy sellsword!

speak;Mia; Really now? A deadly pirate like me getting replaced?{w} Bah, I'd like to see you try.{w} I'm worth ten of anything you'll ever be.{w}{c:expression;Mia;Smile} Your luck's run dry, Goldilocks.{w} Mia's coming to get you!
